verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's latest restriction on travel to the United States from a handful of mostly Muslim countries [V: seemed] [ARG1: likely to survive Supreme Court review , based on comments from the justices during an hour of animated courtroom argument Wednesday] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's latest restriction on travel to the United States from a handful of mostly Muslim countries] seemed likely to [V: survive] [ARG1: Supreme Court review , based on comments from the justices during an hour of animated courtroom argument Wednesday] .

President Donald Trump 's latest restriction on travel to the United States from a handful of mostly Muslim countries seemed likely to survive [ARG1: Supreme Court review] , [V: based] [ARG2: on comments from the justices during an hour of animated courtroom argument Wednesday] .

President Donald Trump 's latest restriction on travel to the United States from a handful of mostly Muslim countries seemed likely to survive Supreme Court review , based on comments from the justices during an hour of [V: animated] [ARG1: courtroom argument] Wednesday .
